item.description: Our first meetup was a total success! I see our group growing daily. It is my hope to meet and share with other raw vegans or people who are interested in more information about eating raw. Our community is small but growing daily as more people realize only we can take care of our health and well being. Whether you have been smart enough on your own to realize that our diet has to change or you have been banged over the head by a medical crisis as I was and forced to change there is much we can learn from each other. Bring a dish...swap some recipes....ask questions...have some fun. Here's to some holiday cheer!! Yahoo!

group.name: Manchester Raw Vegan Food Meetup Group

item.name: Manchester Raw Vegan Food December Meetup
